channel.title: Need help on my server getting my bro to loggin
channel.description: hi i have a server vengencekoz.tk which people download the client to loggin in at vengencekoz.no-ip.biz and i loggin using localhost. it works fine but when my brother tries to loggin on the other computer in the same house it doesnt work. we have tried logging it into localhost and the server ip but nothing seems to work we have been trying for so long now can someone helpout !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Need help on my server getting my bro to loggin

hi i have a server vengencekoz.tk which people download the client to loggin in at vengencekoz.no-ip.biz and i loggin using localhost. it works fine but when my brother tries to loggin on the other computer in the same house it doesnt work. we have tried logging it into localhost and the server ip but nothing seems to work
we have been trying for so long now can someone helpout !!!
